ygData.subject: Horribly Frustrated on Tarrew Marr
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings Fellow Tinkers! I m currently at 104 skill, and so am making aqualungs.  So far I m 4/8, so each aqualung is costing me about 500. My problem is that
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings Fellow Tinkers!

I'm currently at 104 skill, and so am making aqualungs. So far I'm 4/8, so each aqualung is costing me about 500.

My problem is that no one wants to buy them from me. How much are people
selling these for on other servers, and where? Even in Dagnor's I can't seem
to get anyone to buy. I think I'm the only active tinker on the server, but
that doesn't help if no one wants to buy my wares (. Should I just be selling
back to the vendor?

I'm I out of luck til I can make rebreathers?

Thanks all

Llabak Tharr of COR
26 Mage and Master Tinker
Tarrew Marr server
